```{r}
 acgr %>% 
  filter(ACGR_total >= 0.9) %>% 
  select(statename, ACGR_total)
```

```{r}
acgr %>% 
  arrange(desc(ACGR_total)) %>% 
  slice(1:10)

ggplot(data = acgr, aes(x = ACGR_total, y = ACGR_black)) +
  geom_point()
```



```{r}
acgr <- acgr %>% 
  mutate(black_white = ACGR_white - ACGR_black) %>% 
  mutate(hisp_white = ACGR_white - ACGR_hispanic) %>% 
  mutate(lowinc_diff = ACGR_total - ACGR_lowinc)

acgr_bw10 <- acgr %>% 
  arrange(desc(black_white)) %>% 
  slice(1:10)

  ggplot(data = acgr_bw10, aes(x = statename, y = black_white, fill = ACGR_black)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  coord_flip() +
    theme_bw()
```


```{r}
ggplot(data = acgr, aes(x = black_white, y = hisp_white)) +
  geom_point()
```
